titleStmt.title: A new poem on the dreadful death of the Earl of Essex, who cut his own throat in the Tower by the Embroyan-fancy of anti-Jack Presbyter.
titleStmt.author: Embroyan-fancy of anti-Jack Presbyter.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library and the British Library.
